Author: danw
Title: Last desktop app standing: IM Client

Author: mattculbreth
Content: I saw a big momentum improvement in my startup as soon as I got a development server setup with Trac.  The wiki on there has definitely given us a place to toss ideas around and to have them recorded.  The problem with email is that things get too spread out across different threads.  The wiki lets you structure it more permanently.\n

Author: danw
Title: Copyright: get to know the facts
